title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community 

Safety Act 2024 (Notifiable Misconduct) Regulations 2025.

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 2 April 2025.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 2 April 2025.

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: In these Regulations, “Act” means the Policing, Security and Community
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations, “Act” means the Policing, Security and Community 

Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024).
text_norm: 3 regulation act mean policing security community safety act 2024 (no 1 2024)

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 4. Each type of misconduct (within the meaning of paragraph (a) of the
text_raw:
4. Each type of misconduct (within the meaning of paragraph (a) of the 

definition of misconduct in section 193(1) of the Act) – 

(a) 

specified in the Schedule, and 

(b) other than insofar as it is otherwise an incident of concern, 

is prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (b) of the definition of “notifiable 
misconduct” in the said section 193(1). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

Notifiable Misconduct 

[117] 3 

Regulation 4
text_norm: 4 type misconduct (within meaning paragraph (a) definition misconduct section 193(1) act) - (a) specified schedule (b) insofar otherwise incident concern prescribed purpose paragraph (b) definition notifiable misconduct said section 193(1) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 8th april 2025 schedule notifiable misconduct 117 3 regulation 4

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 1. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an
text_raw:
1. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an 
obligation imposed on him or her by the policy document of An Garda Síochána 
for the time being known as “Covert Human Intelligence Sources policy and 
procedures of An Garda Síochána”.
text_norm: 1 failure member garda siochana comply obligation imposed policy document garda siochana time known covert human intelligence source policy procedure garda siochana

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 4. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an
text_raw:
4. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an 
obligation imposed on him or her by any of the policy documents of An Garda 
Síochána for the time being known as: 

(a) 

“Use of Firearms by Members on Duty Policy”; 

(b) 

“Use of Official Firearms or Ammunition Policy”; 

(c) 

“Care and Maintenance of Firearms and Ammunition Policy”.
text_norm: 4 failure member garda siochana comply obligation imposed policy document garda siochana time known (a) use firearm member duty policy (b) use official firearm ammunition policy (c) care maintenance firearm ammunition policy

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 5. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an
text_raw:
5. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an 
obligation imposed on him or her by the policy document of An Garda Síochána 
for the time being known as “Complaints and Reports made to An Garda 
Síochána - Duty to Investigate Policy” in relation to – 

(a) 

domestic, sexual or gender-based violence against a person, 

(b) without prejudice to subparagraph (a), serious harm being caused 

to a person, or 

(c) 

the death of a person. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [117]

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 9. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an
text_raw:
9. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an 
obligation imposed on him or her by any of the policy documents of An Garda 
Síochána for the time being known as: 

(a) 

“An Garda Síochána Security Policy for use of Information and 
Communications Technology, including portable data devices 
and the transfer of electronic data”; 

(b) 

“Communication Systems Policy”; 

(c) 

“E-Mail Policy”; 

(d) 

“Internet and E-Mail Usage Policy”; 

(e) 

(f) 

“ICT Information and Security Policy”; 

“Data Protection Policy”.
text_norm: 9 failure member garda siochana comply obligation imposed policy document garda siochana time known (a) garda siochana security policy use information communication technology including portable data device transfer electronic data (b) communication system policy (c) e-mail policy (d) internet e-mail usage policy (e) (f) ict information security policy data protection policy

text_raw:

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 11. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an
text_raw:
11. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an 
obligation imposed on him or her by either of the policy documents of An Garda 
Síochána for the time being known as: 

(a) 

(b) 

“Prohibited Spare-Time Activities HQ Directive”; 

“Business Interests and Secondary Occupations Policy of An 
Garda Síochána”.

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
heading: 12. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an
text_raw:
12. Any failure by a member of An Garda Síochána to comply with an 
obligation imposed on him or her by the policy document of An Garda Síochána 
for the time being known as “Anti-Corruption Policy of An Garda Síochána”. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government approves of the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[117] 5

MICHEÁL MARTIN,

JIM O’CALLAGHAN,
